name: deployable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of soldiers or equipment) able to be moved to a place where they can be used when they are needed: The nature of modern warfare requires lighter, more agile, and more easily deployable forces. deployable troops/units/soldiers See
deploy
More examplesFewer examplesThe device will not be deployable for at least another couple of years.Troops need to be mobile, rapidly deployable and better equipped.Some of these weapons are deployable within 45 minutes of an order to use them.
